text: wae neohuineun wiseonjaui illo inhayeo du mulilo nanueojilyeo haneu nyo hananimkkeseo geudeul-ui wiseon-eulo malmiam-a geudeul-eul bulsinjalo mandeul-eoss-eul ppun-ila hananimkkeseo banghwangke han geuleul guhalyeo haneunyo hananimkkeseo banghwangkehan geuleul wihae geudaeneun bangbeob eul chaj-ji moshalila
